title: Crude oil imports to Canada by region of origin 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Imports in million metric tons for 9 number of Countrys.
The Imports in million metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country Total and lowest at Country Russia.
Country Russia has 145.5 times less Imports in million metric tons than Country Total which is the highest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Imports in million metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
The Imports in million metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country Total and lowest at Country Russia.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Imports in million metric tons for 9 number of Countrys.
The Imports in million metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country Total and lowest at Country Russia.
Country Russia has 145.5 times less Imports in million metric tons than Country Total which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Imports in million metric tons for 9 number of Countrys.
The Imports in million metric tons is highest at Country Total and lowest at Country Russia.
The highest Country Total has 28.9 more Imports in million metric tons than the lowest Country Russia.
Imports in million metric tons at Country Total is 29.1 , second place is United States at 18.8, and thirdly is Saudi Arabia at 5.6.
Similar Imports in million metric tons is found in Country West Africa, and CIS (excluding Russia).
The Country Russia tends to be 4.51 percent lower than average.
The Imports in million metric tons is 58.1 if we add up values of all Countrys.
